title: what is the  "you are doing that too much wait 7 minutes"" equivalent on ruqqus?

body:
Posting the same content six times within a few minutes get you a 24-ban and all six posts deleted automatically...that's the only thing I've discovered thusfar...and sometimes I post quite a bit. Never understood how they managed to get rid of all Reddit's bullshit about "Not enough rep so you can't post in this guild" "Not enough rep specifically in this guild, so your posts will be shadowbanned and only you will see them", "please wait 15 minutes before posting again", etc.

Yet we have no more problems with "real" spam than Reddit does - it's wonderful.
body_html:
Posting the same content six times within a few minutes get you a 24-ban and all six posts deleted automatically...that's the only thing I've discovered thusfar...and sometimes I post quite a bit. Never understood how they managed to get rid of all Reddit's bullshit about "Not enough rep so you can't post in this guild" "Not enough rep specifically in this guild, so your posts will be shadowbanned and only you will see them", "please wait 15 minutes before posting again", etc.

Yet we have no more problems with "real" spam than Reddit does - it's wonderful.

😀 Be civil. Be nice. Harassment, trolling, and disruptive behavior is not allowed. Basically, don’t be a jerk.

post.title: what is the  "you are doing that too much wait 7 minutes"" equivalent on ruqqus?

body:
On ruqqus, you can get spam-banned for posting the same thing six times.

On ruqqus, you **do not** get rate-limited, the way you do on reddit.
body_html:
On ruqqus, you can get spam-banned for posting the same thing six times.

On ruqqus, you do not get rate-limited, the way you do on reddit.

author.bio:

You can still see my posts on archive.org. And check out +uslashremoved!

I'm cqtz- on reddit and cqtz on SaidIt. https://youtube.com/watch?v=o_LskiXQ73c

body:
>Posting the same content six times within a few minutes get you a 24-ban and all six posts deleted automatically...that's the only thing I've discovered thusfar...and sometimes I post quite a bit.

The first part is about [ruqqus](https://ruqqus.com/post/47ck/ruqqus-admins-now-banning-people-for/efq9).

>Never understood how they managed to get rid of all Reddit's bullshit about "Not enough rep so you can't post in this guild" "Not enough rep specifically in this guild, so your posts will be shadowbanned and only you will see them", "please wait 15 minutes before posting again", etc.

In the second part, he describes reddit using ruqqus's terminology.

<sup> - sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, **don't** censor my username]</sup>
body_html:
Posting the same content six times within a few minutes get you a 24-ban and all six posts deleted automatically...that's the only thing I've discovered thusfar...and sometimes I post quite a bit.

The first part is about ruqqus.

Never understood how they managed to get rid of all Reddit's bullshit about "Not enough rep so you can't post in this guild" "Not enough rep specifically in this guild, so your posts will be shadowbanned and only you will see them", "please wait 15 minutes before posting again", etc.

In the second part, he describes reddit using ruqqus's terminology.

- sfrohne [If you're going to post a screenshot of this comment, don't censor my username]

post.title: what is the  "you are doing that too much wait 7 minutes"" equivalent on ruqqus?

body:
For Reddit that "feature" is for users who have a certain ratio of downvotes in any given sub. It's obnoxious considering that a lot of downvotes are due to dissenting opinions. If the sub is popular enough you have like 4 people replying and you can't reply to all of them in a timely manner because of that dumbass feature.

Leaving Reddit was one of the better decisions I've made.
body_html:
For Reddit that "feature" is for users who have a certain ratio of downvotes in any given sub. It's obnoxious considering that a lot of downvotes are due to dissenting opinions. If the sub is popular enough you have like 4 people replying and you can't reply to all of them in a timely manner because of that dumbass feature.

Leaving Reddit was one of the better decisions I've made.
